sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your sessions and distribute elements into groups
sessions.noSessionsDescription: Create your first session to start organizing elements and distributing them into groups.
sessions.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all elements and attributes associated with this session. This action cannot be undone.
sessions.demoDescription: 30 students with gender, age, and disruptive attributes

session.notFoundDescription: The session you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.

sessionDialog.title: Create New Session
sessionDialog.description: Enter a name for your new session.
sessionDialog.elementDescription: What do you call the items in this session? (e.g., "student" for students, "participant" for participants)
sessionDialog.colorThemeDescription: Choose a color theme for this session

elements.title: Elements
elements.noElementsDescription: Add elements to this session to start organizing and distributing them into groups.
elements.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.noAttributesDescription: Define attributes to classify and organize your elements.
attributes.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will remove this attribute from all elements. This action cannot be undone.
attributes.tableDescription: Define attributes that {{elementLabel}}s in this session can have
attributes.aboutAttributesDescription: Attributes define the properties that {{elementLabel}}s can have. Use enum for predefined options, number for numeric values, attractive for boolean properties where checked elements should be grouped together, and repulsive for boolean properties where checked elements should be separated.
attributes.deleteConfirmationExtended: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{name}}" attribute? This will remove this attribute from all {{elementLabel}}s in the session. This action cannot be undone.

attributeDialog.addDescription: Define a new attribute for elements in this session.

typeDescriptions.enum: Select from a predefined list of options
typeDescriptions.number: Enter a numeric value with optional min/max constraints
typeDescriptions.attractive: Boolean - elements with this checked will be grouped together
typeDescriptions.repulsive: Boolean - elements with this checked will be in different groups

attributeDialog.optionsHint: Define the possible values for this attribute
attributeDialog.atLeastOneOption: At least one option is required
attributeDialog.enumOptionsRequired: Enum attributes must have at least one option

elementDialog.editDescription: Update the {{label}} information and attributes below.
elementDialog.attractiveHint: Elements with this checked will be grouped together
elementDialog.repulsiveHint: Elements with this checked will be in different groups

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.noDistributionsDescription: Create a distribution to organize elements into groups.
distribution.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
distribution.keepGroupsEqualSize: Keep groups roughly equal in size

constraintMode.exclude: Different values cannot be in same group

distribution.updateGroupError: An error occurred while updating the group
distribution.regeneratedDescription: Groups have been reassigned with the same constraints

distributionDialog.description: Generate balanced groups with optional constraints
distributionDialog.balanceGroupSizesHint: Keep groups roughly equal in size (recommended)
distributionDialog.selectAttributesHint: Select attributes to balance across groups
distributionDialog.modeExcludeHint: Different values cannot be in the same group
distributionDialog.mandatoryHint: This constraint MUST be satisfied (no swaps that break it)
distributionDialog.retryableError: This error is retryable. Click "Retry" to attempt generation again, or "Cancel" to close this dialog.

settings.sessionInformationDescription: Edit the basic information about this session

distributionGeneration.unableToCreate: Unable to create distribution with mandatory constraints after {{maxAttempts}} attempts.
distributionGeneration.constraintsTooComplex: The constraints may be too complex or conflicting.
distributionGeneration.excludeRequiresMoreGroups: Mandatory constraint "{{attributeName}}" (exclude mode) requires at least {{requiredGroups}} groups ({{uniqueValues}} unique values need to be in separate groups), but only {{requestedGroups}} groups requested.
distributionGeneration.repulsiveRequiresMoreGroups: Mandatory constraint "{{attributeName}}" cannot be satisfied: value "{{problematicValue}}" appears {{occurrences}} times but only {{requestedGroups}} groups requested (same values must be in different groups).
distributionGeneration.conflictingConstraints: Conflicting mandatory constraints: elements "{{element1}}" and "{{element2}}" must be together (attractive constraint) AND must be apart (repulsive/exclude constraint). This is impossible to satisfy.

constraintIssues.enumNotEvenlyDistributed: {{attributeName}}: value "{{value}}" is not evenly distributed across groups
constraintIssues.numberAveragesNotBalanced: {{attributeName}}: averages are not balanced across groups
constraintIssues.attractiveValueSpread: {{attributeName}}: value "{{value}}" is spread across {{groupCount}} groups (should be together)
constraintIssues.repulsiveValueRepeated: {{attributeName}}: value "{{value}}" appears {{count}} times in Group {{groupNumber}} (should be separated)
constraintIssues.groupSizesNotBalanced: Group sizes are not balanced (range: {{minSize}}-{{maxSize}}, ideal: {{idealSize}})
